QuestData.Title: Avenge Me!
QuestData.Description: I hear them, $g brother:sister;....$b$bThe moans of the wounded Alliance... they taunt me...$b$bFinish what we have begun here, $c. Show no mercy... let none of them survive.$b$bFor... the Horde...
QuestData.LogDescription: A Dying Berserker has asked that you slay 5 Dying Soldiers at the Broken Front. Report to Sky-Reaver Korm Blackscar on Orgrim's Hammer when it is done.
QuestData.RewardText: The time of tolerance for the Alliance has passed, $n.$b$bThey have earned our hatred! They shall live in fear of the Horde until they no longer pollute our world!
